title: HRIntegrationPlan — Northstar / Riverbend — Diligence — 2025-07-28
all_text:
HR INTEGRATION PLAN — DAY-1 THROUGH DAY-90 (INTERNAL)
Date: 2025-07-28
Stage: Diligence

Objectives:
- Retain key technical staff and customer-facing leaders
- Harmonize compensation/benefits without disrupting operations
- Communicate clearly and reduce uncertainty

Key actions:
- Offer retention bonuses to 8 key employees (engineering + sales).
- Confirm role mapping and reporting lines within 2 weeks post-close.
- Align benefits enrollment window; maintain current plans through Day-30.
- Set up weekly Q&A sessions; publish integration FAQ.

Risks:
- Key-person dependency in firmware team; propose pairing and documentation sprint.
- Culture mismatch between fast-moving hardware ops and software cadence.

Owners:
- Northstar HR: Avery Patel
- Riverbend HR: Omar Hassan
